title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 494-1.9 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 494-1.9 - Severability

State Regulations

Each provision of this Part shall be deemed severable, and in the event that any provision of this Part is held to be invalid, the
remainder of this Part shall continue in full force and
effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
494-1.9

Adopted

New

York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
